mapper.sql: id, week, startetime, endtime, type, fk_child_id, create_time, times, flag

from times
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update times
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
week = #{record.week,jdbcType=CHAR},
startetime = #{record.startetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endtime = #{record.endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fk_child_id = #{record.fkChildId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
times = #{record.times,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{record.flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update times set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, week = #{record.week,jdbcType=CHAR}, startetime = #{record.startetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endtime = #{record.endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fk_child_id = #{record.fkChildId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, times = #{record.times,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{record.flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update times
week = #{week,jdbcType=CHAR},
startetime = #{startetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fk_child_id = #{fkChildId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
times = #{times,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update times set week = #{week,jdbcType=CHAR}, startetime = #{startetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fk_child_id = #{fkChildId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, times = #{times,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
